stimulusHtml: Which of the following voice-leading procedures is heard in the resolution from the penultimate to the final chord?

features.html: The following question is based on an excerpt for string orchestra that consists of an introduction (performed pizzicato) and a main section (performed arco).

choicesHtml: The chordal seventh resolves downward by step in an inner voice.
The fifth of a seventh chord in root position is omitted.
A common tone is held in the soprano.
The bass moves down by step.
